boardgame.name: War of the Ring
Wojna o Pierścień
boardgame.description: 'War of the Ring'. On a large map of Middle Earth, armies are mustering and heroes are readying to fight the shadow spreading out of Mordor. The game is played on two levels. Both sides (or three if someone wants to play Saruman) have great armies that battle in a typical wargame style while another game is going on at the same time with individual characters around the fate of the One Ring. In the Campaign game Sauron's forces are the more powerful but the free peoples get the edge in the Character game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Highly sought after as a collectors item. It could be purchased with either a paper map or a full mounted map, and was also sold in a three-game set with the folio games Gondor and Sauron. This set is called The Games of Middle Earth._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 1977 Charles S. Roberts Best Fantasy Board Game Nominee
1977 Charles S. Roberts Best Fantasy Board Game Winner
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: GrogCast Season 5 Episode 12 – A Cast of Many
I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve Been Diced! episode 31: Three player games

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: This is a rarity among rarities. S.P.I._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;s The Games of Middle Earth, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;The War of the Ring: S.R. 1418 to 1419_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; with _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Gondor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Sauron_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. This is the Deluxe version of the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;War of the Ring_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; game which includes two smaller games _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Sauron_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Gondor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. The Ring game was played a couple of times but all 400 counters are present and in excellent condition (see the four photos). All 112 character cards are present in plastic sleeves and are in excellent condition with one small blue line on the text side of #75, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Boromir attempts to steal the Ring._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; The counters for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Gondor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; are punched but counted by hand and all 200 are present in excellent condition. The counters for Sauron are unpunched. The main map hardly shows any age stress, the creases present are to be expected with a 25 year old folded paper map and there is one small stain on the portion where the Magic Item cards are placed. The maps for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Gondor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Sauron_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; are pristine. There is one blank Character Endurance Level Chart (both sides) and the charts for all games are in good to excellent condition. The rules for The Ring game are well worn but entirely readable and functional, there is a stain on the back page and the cover is splitting at the binding fold but all pages are attached and readable. There are three sets of Standard Rules for Gondor and Sauron and the exclusive rules for each game are in perfect condition. The original counter tray is present in excellent condition. This is an incredible find but that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;s not all folks! As shown in one of the photos there is a spare Character/Monster card sheet which remains unpunched. It is the fourth of the sheets with numbers running from 85 to 112. Amazing. Ask any questions before buying. Shipping will be $8.50 in the continental US and both insurance and return receipt are MANDATORY on this item. Insurance is $3.50 and return receipt is $1.75. Any foreign buyer will also pay insurance and return receipt (if available) and S/H will be calculated based on destination. I must receive payment within 10 business days or the sale will be canceled and the item relisted with appropriate negative feedback.

Won as an auction item. This was used when obtained. It is complete. However, I have mounted the mapsheet onto old game boards and to do that, had to cut the mapsheet to fit the boards. While I feel the result is fine for more ease in playing on a flat surface, a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;purist_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; may not want this copy. Definately a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;to play_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; version. Bos is definitely showing age but the components are complete and in very good condition. Mapsheet is the main issue here.

_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The Ring Trilogy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; edition, includes Gondor and Sauron. Much tougher to find than the version without the expansions. One split end, but otherwise very good condition. The maps are particularly nice condition (normally they wear easily as they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re not mounted or laminiated, but these are in very good condition). Shipping within the US via insured priority mail. Note to International (non-US) buyers: I must declare actual value on all customs forms. **I will not falsify values on customs forms, no exceptions!**. For International orders, only Paypal is accepted.

This is a very nice condition copy of the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;war of the Ring_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; it is actually the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Middle Earth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; version the ring trilogy. It includes _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;War of the Ring_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Gondor - The Seige of Minas Tirith_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Sauron - The battle for the Ring_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. All the component are in good condition all four map sheets , all 112 cards and 699 counter are present (1 counter appears to be missing). All the contents are in excellent condition, the box is square no bows or splits just a little rubbed on the edges. Extra Photo if required.
Box scuffed at the edges, but contents superb. The cards are separated, but the counters are still unpunched. All maps in wonderful condition.

Box shows some wear. The cover is the Balrog fighting Gandalf NOT the Ralph Bakshi cover. All pieces punched out and in bags. I am open to negotiations on the price. This is the version with the cardboard game board. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a big three piece monster of a game board as a matter of fact. There doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t seem to be any expansions with it. Everything listed on the instruction manual is in the box. Also, as far as damage goes, the box is in really good shape with only some wear around the edges and one corner is split. There_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s some water stains on the inside of the lid but nothing big. One playing card, Celeborn, has a tear on the coating on the back but nothing that obscures any printing or artwork for the card. There_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s also 3 small brown stains on one of the map pieces but I had to look pretty close to find those. I am unable to host pictures but can send some pics by email if you like.

Box is worn, with some wrinkling, a bit of bowing, two split corners - repaired on the inside with transparent box tape. Missing two informational counters (game turn and shadow points) and one magic card (#54). Color scans and jpegs provided of all. Three of the tear-out record sheets are used, leaving three.

Includes War of the Ring, Sauron and Gondor. Good condition. All peices present. Maps and counters in good condition. Very few plays. Slight separation of box bottom/sides. Outer box in good condition with typical wear of box thats been carefully stored for 24 years. The tables for the gondor game were pulled from the directions, but still present. A few pencil marks in directions. Pen addition to one character card (minor game balance change).

Punched but complete (I counted all the pieces!). Mounted map boards. Game componants are sorted by army and in excellent condition. One of the stat sheets has some pencil markings. The box is in good condition considering it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s age - some shelf wear is evident and 2 corners have been taped to repair minor splits.

I have by some bizzarre coincidence 41 of the cards from _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;war of the ring. This is not the full set of cards as there are 121 in total. These are numbers 1-40 and 98. (card numbers are in the top left hand corner) They consist of the yello,buff,pink,white character cards. The red servants of sauron and #98 the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;three naguls_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; search card. I guess they might be of use to someone.

Played/punched not shrinkwrapped. Part of a LARGE estate sale - most of the games are being sold to ONE buyer, some games are being sold to gamers... This edition of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;War of the Ring_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; includes the games _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Gondor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Sauron_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; as well. Shipment will be in mid-late June, when full collection of games is removed from storage. Will accept Paypal - but buyer must pay all associated fees. Will ship worldwide. For shipments in US, game will be shipped priority mail. For worldwide shipments, amount charged will be actual cost.

3 game edition all checked and 100% complete, includes 2 sheets of counters mostly unpunched (see photos) All contents in excellent condition: Rulebook (including chart and table sheets, and endurance level charts in centre pages) 700 die-cut counters (over half of these unpunched) 112 playing cards 4 games maps (east, west, Gondor and Sauron) 2 6-sided dice 2 sets standard rule booklets Gondor exclusive rules Sauron exclusive rules 2 sheets Gondor charts and tables Counter tray Box: Good condition considering its age - the top of the box dips in slightly and there is some minor scuffing but all corners are still intact. (see photos) Buyer to pay shipping and optional insurance.
Box is slightly damaged but otherwise unpunched and in perfect condition. A collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s dream item. Shipping at buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s discretion. Price is in US dollars.
The Sauron and Gondor games are unplayed (counters unpunched). Everything is in good shape. Not much else to add, really!

This is the SPI designer edition with mounted board. Recreate J.R. Tolkein_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s classic tale in this game designed by Richard Berg and Howard Barasch. Components, rules and charts are all intact, and game includes a chit tray. Box is old and has some wear and torn edges, many of which have been repaired with tape.

The game is punched but otherwise complete and in good condition (the map has some neat marker annotations of a victory point variant, but it is perfectly playable and otherwise as new, and the box inside is annotated with counter disposition. See photos). Also included issue no. 37 of Moves magazine, which contains an article with the rules to play the game with three players. Please note that this is NOT the complete Middle Earth trilogy, it just comes in its tombstone box: the only game contained is War of the Ring.

80% Unpuched. Designer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition WITHOUT Sauron and Gondor games, but with mounted map. Box in fair shape with a bare spot where price tag was taken off (not by me). Complete and in great condition.
This is the Middle Earth version, which includes the two operational games, Sauron and Gondor.
Maps have some tape residue stains at edges but are perfectly readable. Box is scuffed and stained. Shipping to UK destination = £6

Description/Condition: Most of the game is unpunched and like new. However, one card has a nick on it. The rules are stained and well read. This is the white designer box and it is beat up. FOR Bill Johnston ONLY - Winner of Geeklist Auction $8 for Priority Mail

Designer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition Olive green box. Unplayed, a few cards aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t even separated. Partial punched counters have been verified to be complete, counters like new. Mapboards like new. Punched counters are organized, separated and stored in ziplock as are the unseparated cards. Rules booklet is in excellent condition/like new. Box is better than the average I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve handled of this title. 3.5 on a 1-5 scale (5 best)with modest storing abrasions and shelving fade but there are no major imperfections. NUMEROUS EXTRAS PROVIDED including periodical articles from ALL Moves issues and the Fire _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Movement article with designer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s notes too. Plus a WOTR additions article from Campaign magazine. And some _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;homemade_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; quality color deployment tables and additional charts.
This is the Middle Earth 3 game set, War of the Ring+Gondor+Sauron Components complete and in very good condition. Box has significant scuffs. Shipping to UK destination £6

Complete, and all components in excellent condition, apart from 5 cards which have been damaged by decayed elastic bands (see picture). Shipping as follows: UK - £2.90 Europe - £5.30 Rest of World - £10.10
Box game punched Postage UK £7 Europe £10 Others £19

This listing is for the 1977 War of the Ring game by SPI. It has never been played and all components are unpunched. The box shows very minor dishing and scuffage with the only damage being one torn corner. No signs of water damage, no odd smells, and comes from a pet free/smoke free environment. This game has been stored for many years and unfortunately has never seen gameplay. The version being sold is the following: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/image/24750 Shipping is $13 to anywhere in the United States. Thanks for checking out this listing! Feel free to contact me with further questions on the condition of the game.
Opened but unpunched. Complete. Cards uncut. This is the mounted map version without Sauron and Gondor.
War of the Ring by SPI (White Box, Bakshi Artwork) Box intact (little grubby on the front) Items present but the pieces are punched. (Will also trade for Warhammer 40k Nurgle items)
Mounted board.

SPi War of the Ring Trilogy Been in storage for many years counters punched... only played once or twice SPI _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;flat pack_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; box has some damage pics available on request
1977 revised edition! Very Good condition; includes Sauron and Gondor (Sauron is unpunched!) USA buyers may pay via check, MO, or PayPal International buyer must pay via PayPal only.
Complete and in good condition. Most counters not punched. Box scuffed Shipping to UK destination £6

THIS ITEM IS NOT FOR SALE - UNDER OFFER This is the highly collectible Middle Earth version with the Gondor and Sauron games included. The box looks exactly like the main BGG image. It has the thick card maps (not mounted). The counters, cards, boards, rules etc are in really good condition. The box has some slight scuffing to the edges and a tiny barely noticeable dent to the base but is in remarkable condition considering its age. I have owned the game from new and it has only been played a couple of times. I would be delighted to get this myself and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m very picky about game condition! Postage and Packing:- World Wide - Air Mail, NOT Signed For: £15.00

The more desirable Ralph Bakshi art, white cover version. Pretty much perfect. Components including maps, cards, counters and rulebook are in excellent, never-been-played condition. Box has some very minor shelfwear. I store my games in a pet-free and smoke-free environment and I package my games for shipment with the utmost care. I ship quickly - within 24 hours of receiving payment. Shipping weight is 5 pounds.

This is a copy of SPI_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The Games of Middle Earth -- War of the Ring._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; It is the edition that includes all 3 games (ie. Gondor, Sauron, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; War of the Ring). The box is in good condition. It has a little creasing in the lower left corner and a slight amount of fading, but overall is in quite good shape with no split corners or tearing of any kind. The game contents are in very good condition. I did a careful count of the cards and they are all there. All the cards EXCEPT one are in very good condition. The #89 card has a slight tearing in the upper left corner (see provided picture), but this is NOT visible when the card is face down, so it should NOT affect game play in any way. All the maps, rules, and player aids are also present and in very good condtion. I counted out all the game chits and the count totaled 700. According to the rules there should only be 300 total chits, so I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know why my count came out so high. Needless to say, I believe all the chits are there, perhaps with some extras. I did an extensive search online and on BGG for a manifest of the chits but could not find one. I am willing to ship via any method the buyer prefers, so just let me know. If you have any questions or would like to see more pictures don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t hesitate to ask. Also feel free to make me an offer on this game if you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t like/can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t afford the posted price. I may just take you up on it. Can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t hurt to ask anyway. :)

Game components complete and in good condition except that maps were once taped together and where tape has come off has left a stain. Map is quite readable through this stain. SPI edition Shipping to UK destination £6
Complete, played once, almost as good as new
For Games into Equity auction winner Killing Joke.

I bought this in 1977, and to my knowledge it hasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t been opened since then. Unpunched counters. Original rubber bands on the playing cards, etc.
Punched and possibly played a few times. All 112 cards present, chits not counted.

Reserved for fallen (Jamie Groulx) In excellent condition and complete. The box has a couple of minor marks, only to be expected for a game of this vintage! The contents are absolutely perfect. This is the version with the Bakshi movie cover. Shipping will £12 (airmail).
Contents are complete and in very good condition, with the exception of the rulebook which is in fair condition. The box is in poor condition.

Good to Very Good. Thrifted version that appears to have been well cared for. Chits punched and uncounted but are all neatly organized in the box. Maps and rule books in excellent condition. Charts and table and all rule books as well as all 112 cards accounted for. Box shows some wear but corners are intact. This is the SPI 1977 version with paper maps.
Original owner. Maps, rules, cards and chits in excellent (like-new) shape; some chits never separated/punched. All chits kept in protective case. Box has minor wear on one bottom edge.
Main game punched Includes the Gondor and Sauron mini games (unpunched).
cards and chits and maps are complete and in very good condition. The is the SPI 1977 yellow edition with plastic lid and tray for counters. The box and lid are intact but show signs of wear

Middle Earth version with the two mini-games. All components in like new condition. There are maybe a dozen or so counters punched out; but the rest are still intact on the counter sheets. Send me any questions you might have although there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s not much else to say about it.

selling a complete version of this game. it is the bakshi movie art cover and everything is accounted for. only on the side of the box there is a stain of some sort. shipping is on the buyer. pictures can be given on request.

Punched, missing one card and eleven counters. The box is in poor/fair condition: One split corner on the lid, one split corner on the bottom, and some concavity, wear, stains also on the lid. The rulebook generally shows its age and has some miscellaneous notations written inside. The maps are in very good condition. The event cards have their ID # circled in pen, and a couple of the character cards had been _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;improved_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; upon (I counted three) by the previous owner drawing an extra feature or two in pen. Besides that, the cards are in good condition.

SPI 3 game version. Contents are like new. The Gondor and Sauron game counters have never been punched! The main tiles, rules, cards are in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;like new_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; condition. Lid is very slightly creased in the corners and has some very light scuffing. --- Postage/carriage at cost, rounded up to next pound to offset Paypal charges.
punched, complete, never played box has some wear

Designers Edition. Box has shelf wear and one edge is broken up the seam. but over all in good condition. All pieces and parts are present. The play sheets have been marked in pencil (lightly) so easy enough to clean one up to make good copies. Great Illustration and very faithful to the story.

Flat tray_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s cardboard backing has come loose. Counters 60% punched. Charts and record sheets are still present in the rulebook and unmarked. In addition to the original paper mapsheets I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m including a set of the mounted mapboards from the designers edition of the game.
All maps are mounted on heavy (4 mm) cardboard (front and rear =_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 4 tiles = 2 43x55 cm and 2 43x27 cm). Gondor counters are still framed.

Middle Earth, the ring trilogy version with Gondor and Sauron games included. The paper maps are included with this version and are in mint condition. Counters and cards have been punched, but are lightly played and in excellent condition. Box shows minor shelf wear with no split corners. 100% complete.

For a sheet of 400 counters with only 23 of 400 punched and they are present. Very nice sheet with still quite white Gondorians. VG color sheet too

This is the SPI game in the bookshelf box. It is the designers edition with the mounted mapboards. Game is punched, but 100% complete. All the counters, cards and mapboards are in mint, like new condition. The box is solid, all the corners are rigid, but there is shelfwear on the box top and bottom, especially in the corners.
For Lausus from auction
Designer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition Trilogy. Unpunched.

This is the game with the paper (unmounted) maps and include the games Gondor and Sauron. The game is complete, but unfortunately, humidity has impacted this game. The game maps are in good shape, but have some staining. The rules and charts are in good condition. Some of the counters have serious staining, other counters are clean. The cards are all stuck together. So this game can be considered to be parted out.

Game componets complete and in good condition except: Rules are grubby from being studied often. The War of the Ring map has been taped and tape glue has yellowed and some damage at folds. Small stain on one card. This is _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Middle Earth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; SPI edition including Gondor and Sauron battles. Shipping to UK destination £7
punched, complete box shows some aging cards are in Italian

For sale: used copy of War of the Ring, SPI Flat Pack British Edition. Now, this is an old game (1977), so read carefully: - Manual and original inserts are in good condition; some small stain on the cover of the manual - The game is COMPLETE. All cards are accounted for, and in (very) good condition. I have counted the counters twice, and come to a total of 400 (which according, to the manual means the game is complete). The counters are in very good condition and have been bagged. - Counters and cards have NO wear on them (looking quite new actually) - Paper map (originally in 2 parts) has been carefully taped together at the back - The plastic flat pack (a counter tray and a cover with an insert) has some damage, but minor (small pieces of the edge missing, but counter tray + cover still intact) - The included day may not be the original one (damaged) - Some errata and player aids marked on some game components in pencil Pictures upon request; ships from the Netherlands. Approximate shipping costs; around 10 euros. Exact costs upon request. Payment through paypal or european money order.

White box edition. Missing only a die, one of the (identical) game tables/aids (the other is present) and some of the original endurance sheets (there were 4 for marking losses etc on) there are a couple of photocopy replacements included. Condition:- - Box: a bit battered with one torn corner (repaired) and some bowing. - Counters: all present and correct = good to very good condition. - Cards: all present and correct - very good condition. - Rule Book: shows significant use and repair attempts, and may have been consulted at the Battle of the Pelanor Fields. It is still readable and usable. - Map (paper not mounted): Good condition although one of the two original panels is more faded than the other. everything is still clear and usable. The two panels were stuck together by a previous owner, but not very well. I have separated them, trimmed and restuck them. They are much better now, and no detail has been lost. Also included are:- - Print out of the revised 2nd edition rules. - Counter manifest scan - OOB and set up sheets. From a smoke and pet free home and will be well packaged.
Comes with gondor and sauron mini expansions. Plastic top is aged and cracked in a ocuple of places, contents are in great shape.

Games of Middle Earth edition with the two additional minigames. Game is unpunched, and in very good condition. See pictures attached to the listing. Please pardon the mess as I was doing renos at the time the picture was taken. Shipping is expected to be about $15 in Canada, and $20 to $25 to the US. Please contact me for a firm quote first.
